Line 30: Line 30:
*'''James Shin Hoo'''
*'''James Shin Hoo'''
â
James is a grumpy and impatient man and likes to rape everypne in the buliding so you better watch out for him or else you will get raped just like otis amber did!!!!Having failed at his career as an inventor, he started an unsuccessful restaurant in Sunset Towers. He doesn't relate well to his wife or his son, who he refers to as a "the best jock in the universe". Beneath his surly demeanor, he is a very caring and ingenious man who often creates practical and ingenious solutions to others' problems. He blames Sam Westing for stealing his inventions-namely the disposable paper diaper-and gaining wealth and fame, while Hoo languishes in obscurity. At the end of the story he makes a veritable fortune.
+
James is a grumpy and impatient man. Having failed at his career as an inventor, he started an unsuccessful restaurant in Sunset Towers. He doesn't relate well to his wife or his son, who he refers to as a "the best jock in the universe". Beneath his surly demeanor, he is a very caring and ingenious man who often creates practical and ingenious solutions to others' problems. He blames Sam Westing for stealing his inventions-namely the disposable paper diaper-and gaining wealth and fame, while Hoo languishes in obscurity. At the end of the story he makes a veritable fortune.
*'''Sunny Lin Hoo'''
*'''Sunny Lin Hoo'''
â
Sun Lin comes from China, uhhhhh yeaaaahhhhh soniaaaaaaa my boniiaaaaaaa and speaks practically no English, which isolates her from most of the other residents of Sunset Towers. She is resourceful and able to capitalize on opportunities when they present themselves to her. Because she doesn't speak English, the other residents of the apartment ignore her. However, her "partner" in the Westing Game, Jake Wexler, talks to her, since he realizes that she will never learn English unless someone speaks it to her. She dreams of going back to China, so she is stealing valuable things from the other heirs. In the book's finale, her friendship with Jake pays off; 'Sunny' has become fluent in English and taken over her husband's business. At the end of the book, she visits China.
+
Sun Lin comes from China, and speaks practically no English, which isolates her from most of the other residents of Sunset Towers. She is resourceful and able to capitalize on opportunities when they present themselves to her. Because she doesn't speak English, the other residents of the apartment ignore her. However, her "partner" in the Westing Game, Jake Wexler, talks to her, since he realizes that she will never learn English unless someone speaks it to her. She dreams of going back to China, so she is stealing valuable things from the other heirs. In the book's finale, her friendship with Jake pays off; 'Sunny' has become fluent in English and taken over her husband's business. At the end of the book, she visits China.
*'''Doug Hoo'''
*'''Doug Hoo'''
